## RichUrl.check() method

检查是否是富链接。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static check(value: any): value is string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | 要检查的值 |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is string

返回检查结果

## Example


```typescript
RichUrl.check('http://www.google.com') // => false

```
